name: Wedging
description: Kneading clay to prepare it and remove air pockets.

name: Ball Kneading
description: Kneading the clay with both hands before placing on the wheel.

name: Slab Pressing
description: Pressing clay slabs into molds or together for construction.

name: Beveling
description: Angling or trimming clay edges to join pieces or shape rims.

name: Joining
description: Combining two clay parts to form a unified structure.

name: Smoothing
description: Refining surfaces by running fingers or tools across clay.

name: Sponge Refinement
description: Sponge held at rim or wall while wheel spins.
